org.biohipi.image

Class NiftiImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biohipi.image.BioHipiImage
      • org.biohipi.image.NiftiImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class NiftiImage
extends BioHipiImage
    A NIfTI image represented as an 4-dimensional array of Java doubles. A NiftiImage extends the abstract base class BioHipiImage and consists of a BioHipiImageHeader.
    The org.biohipi.image.io package provides classes for reading (decoding) and writing (encoding) NiftiImage objects in the format NIfTI images.

      • cut

        public NiftiVolume cut(int xStart,
                       int yStart,
                       int zStart,
                       int tStart,
                       int xLength,
                       int yLength,
                       int zLength,
                       int tLength)
        Cuts a region of the NIfTI image.
        Parameters:
        fromX - coordinate value x start cutting
        fromY - coordinate value y start cutting
        fromZ - coordinate value z start cutting
        fromT - coordinate value t start cutting
        xLength - length of the x-axis cutting
        yLength - length of the y-axis cutting
        zLength - length of the z-axis cutting
        tLength - length of the t-axis cutting
        Returns:
        NiftiVolume with a part of voxels of this NIfTI Image.
